hopobject.body:
Support

Explore our support channels to take your project from good to great. With the community’s support, you’ll always have access to the most up-to-date information. You’ve come this far – take a look around and you’ll be back on track very soon.

Ask the Forums»

Chat Live with IRC Support»

Explore the FAQ»

Getting Started

Accomplish beginner tasks quickly by using this step-by-step getting started guide.

Get Going »

System Reference Manuals

Visit the Hardware Support page to access System Technical Reference Manuals for each of the Beagles to learn everything you want to know about hardware specifications.

Hardware Support »

External Resources

Wikis

  • BeagleBone Black/BeagleBone
  • BeagleBoard/BeagleBoard-xM

Browse Community Projects

  • BeagleBone Black/BeagleBone
  • BeagleBoard/BeagleBoard-xM

Software

Learn BoneScript

Linux handles the interfaces, while JavaScript provides the glue: BoneScript application code enables computing exploration. Explore the BoneScript Library and start developing now.

Visit the BoneScript Library »

Software Images

Visit the Software Support page to make sure you have the most up-to-date software image to facilitate your Beagle development experience. Get the latest software image now to jumpstart your development now.

Download the Software Images »

Hardware

Design Documents

Visit the Hardware Support page to find everything from schematics to bills-of-materials to layouts.

Get Design Documents »

Cape Plug-in Boards

By adding up to four capes to your BeagleBone or BeagleBone Black, you can add a variety of functionality features from LCD screens to motor control.

View Cape Plug-in Boards

RMA

If necessary, submit a return merchandise application (RMA) to request the vendor accept your return for a refund or to be fixed at the Beagle hospital.

Submit an RMA »
